channel.title: A Few More Things
channel.description: 1. How do I fix the equipment screen, it shows the default character, no matter what armor I use? 2. How can I make my client like 2speced's (Installer and all. The program file has the cache and uninstaller and all that fancy shit.) 3. How can I make my client auto update without SVN?
